signals.headline: AI Revolution in Healthcare
signals.description: Artificial Intelligence is transforming healthcare delivery and patient outcomes globally.
signals.relevance: AI adoption in healthcare is expected to grow by 40% annually through 2025

signals.relevance: Over 500 communities have adopted these techniques, increasing crop yields by 30%
